TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Xinyi, title = Xinyi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xinyi} }

S.FORM: Xinyi Xinyi gu icuwa i Nantou. ala atjunangn mapuljat 1,423.52 km² (ma'linpan atjunang 1,067.28 km², ma'linaule atjunang 113.33 km²). ala caucau mapuljat 12,373 caucau, ala daceneqlan mapuljat 3,695 a daceneqlan, Bunun (76%) a maqcuwa caucau. kinaizuazua a qinaljan nua sebunun a kacalisiyan aicu a nehunpu a kadjunangan. izua caucau a cou uta. tjatjuruvu a caucau imaza a bunun. imaza izua kakaian na bunun kata cou. kadjunangan izua gadu a saviah kata gadugaduan i vecekadan tua taiwan imaza. pasaviri ta paran (ren'ai gu) kata qabizay (yuchi gu); pasakacedas ta malibasi (wanrung gu) na kalinku king‎; pasakaledep ta cuili (shuili gu), kiuⁿ-á-liâu (lugu gu), kata lîm-kí-poo (zhushan lizuk); pasanavalj ta ngani (taoyuan gu) na takaw(kaohsiung king). kasicuayan cuaicuayanga a pinaljavakan nia dripung a sinkaw gu na taichung ciu ta qinaljan kata kadjunangan imaza. tjaivililj ta kacavilj a 1945, sipaljavaljavak na sihu nia ciukuk tamaza a luna gu saka xinyi gu tucu. na qivu a pinaseljangan na qinaljan sekacalisian i taiwan tu semekez a siayaya tamaza a xinyi nu i kacaviljan a 2014. cempeliv a caucau ta pinapungadan a kadjunangan tamaza a nehunpu. caucau paljavak tua atjunang matja 14 qinaljan i Xinyi. matja 17 qinaljan imaza, Lanngdun , Qapuciu , Tamazuan , Isingan , Laidazuan(malavi) , Naihunpu , Salitung , Sinapalan , Halusipun , Luluna , Qalipusungan , Mahavun (Mamahavunna) , Kalibuan , Tungpu daigaz , Ilausan , Valana , Hanbizan . sinan kilalaing ta xinyi pinaljavakan kinatuluan izua tapuluq saka unem a gakku a kedrikedri imaza. kivangavangan sipacacikelan djalan na kasiya djalan na kasiya i kasikasiw i psoseongana(gadu a alishan) izua ljaljevavavan a dueigaoyue i djalan a cusan(chushan) palidring a djalan sikamasansimuluq saka unem a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansimuluq saka alu a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 21 palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 56 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 91 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 93 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 95 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 97 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw basu yanlin basu(Yuan Lin Bus Co., Ltd.)

Xinyi Xinyi go icowa i Nantoo. ala atjonangn mapoljat 1,423.52 km² (ma'linpan atjonang 1,067.28 km², ma'linaole atjonang 113.33 km²). ala caocao mapoljat 12,373 caocao, ala daceneqlan mapoljat 3,695 a daceneqlan, Bonon (76%) a maqcowa caocao. kinaizoazoa a qinaljan noa sebonon a kacalisiyan aico a nehonpo a kadjonangan. izoa caocao a coo ota. tjatjorovo a caocao imaza a bonon. imaza izoa kakaian na bonon kata coo. kadjonangan izoa gado a saviah kata gadogadoan i vecekadan toa taiwan imaza. pasaviri ta paran (ren'ai go) kata qabizay (yochi go); pasakacedas ta malibasi (wanrong go) na kalinko king‎; pasakaledep ta coili (shoili go), kioⁿ-á-liâo (logo go), kata lîm-kí-poo (zhoshan lizok); pasanavalj ta ngani (taoyoan go) na takaw(kaohsiong king). kasicoayan coaicoayanga a pinaljavakan nia dripong a sinkaw go na taichong cio ta qinaljan kata kadjonangan imaza. tjaivililj ta kacavilj a 1945, sipaljavaljavak na siho nia ciokok tamaza a lona go saka xinyi go toco. na qivo a pinaseljangan na qinaljan sekacalisian i taiwan to semekez a siayaya tamaza a xinyi no i kacaviljan a 2014. cempeliv a caocao ta pinapongadan a kadjonangan tamaza a nehonpo. caocao paljavak toa atjonang matja 14 qinaljan i Xinyi. matja 17 qinaljan imaza, Lanngdon , Qapocio , Tamazoan , Isingan , Laidazoan(malavi) , Naihonpo , Salitong , Sinapalan , Halosipon , Lolona , Qaliposongan , Mahavon (Mamahavonna) , Kaliboan , Tongpo daigaz , Ilaosan , Valana , Hanbizan . sinan kilalaing ta xinyi pinaljavakan kinatoloan izoa tapoloq saka onem a gakko a kedrikedri imaza. kivangavangan sipacacikelan djalan na kasiya djalan na kasiya i kasikasiw i psoseongana(gado a alishan) izoa ljaljevavavan a doeigaoyoe i djalan a cosan(choshan) palidring a djalan sikamasansimoloq saka onem a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansimoloq saka alo a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 21 palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 56 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 91 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 93 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 95 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 97 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw baso yanlin baso(Yoan Lin Bos Co., Ltd.)
